title: Productivity Tuesday Ep#2 --  Pocket Read it Later
tags: how to use pocket app like a pro
description:
http://receivetipstricks.com/use-pocket-effectively/

So you are browsing the web and you come across an interesting article, but the problem is -- you don't have enough time to read it. 

This is a common problem, we have face every day. And pocket is the solution. It's a simple app that let you save articles for later reading. 

And in this video, we will see what exactly is pocket and how does it work. I will also share 4 tips on how to use pocket effectively. 



[Other Videos in productivity Tuesday Series]
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL54E1sm59KWOaOHQRsJEiiyJuRBKfJhht

[Video content]

What is pocket and how does it work
Tip #1 Save article from desktop
Tip #2 Save article from Smartphone to pocket
Tip #3 Read articles offline in Desktop
Tip #4 Listen to articles in pocket
